dialogue.start: We must let our king know of this. These lands belong to us now, and these orcs pose a threat to us. These is no force in the world that can dare oppose our great empire! Here! Send these letters to Shipmaster Stanmore at once!
dialogue.active: Go with haste to shipmaster Stanmore before he sends his ships out.
dialogue.completed: All we can do now is wait for our king's response.
dialogue.r_completed: Our holy magistrate sent you?! I'll send these right away in our fastest ship!
